mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW_COMMENT VALUES(SEQ_COMMENT_NO.NEXTVAL, #{commentContent}, DEFAULT ,#{reviewNo}, #{memberNo}, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT RC.*, M.NICKNAME FROM REVIEW_COMMENT RC JOIN MEMBER M ON RC.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO WHERE REVIEW_NO = #{reviewNo} AND DELETE_YN='N' ORDER BY COMMENT_NO DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE REVIEW_COMMENT SET DELETE_YN = 'Y' WHERE COMMENT_NO = #{commentNo}
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO FROM REVIEW_COMMENT WHERE COMMENT_NO = #{num}
